    • Field Detail

      • PROPERTY_USING_IMAGES_TO_ALIGN

        static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_USING_IMAGES_TO_ALIGN
        Deprecated. 
        Property whose value is used as default state of the isUsingImagesToAlign() export configuration flag.

        This property is set by default (true).

        See Also:
        JRPropertiesUtil, Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • isUsingImagesToAlign

        java.lang.Boolean isUsingImagesToAlign()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a boolean value specifying whether the export engine should use small images for aligning. This is useful when you don't have images in your report anyway and you don't want to have to handle images at all.
        See Also:
        PROPERTY_USING_IMAGES_TO_ALIGN
